item.description:
As expected, the Newcomers who showed up last week shared a fun evening and kicked butt at trivia, trouncing the nearest rival by 31 points. Which means we're committed to going back at least once more.

Come out and help us do it again!

I'll be there at 7:00 to share the prize with the other members of the 1st place team from March 9th if anyone wants to come out early.

The game starts at 8 and runs until 10.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the table with a meetup sign.
item.name: Hooked on Trivia @ Snookers
